class.name: ImageExtension
class.brief_description: An image processing and utility singleton.
class.description: A singleton which handles various image processing tasks. Most methods accept an image as an input.

method.name: bucket_fill
method.description: Fills the area with a [code]fill_color[/code] confined by other opaque pixels. If [code]fill_image[/code] is [code]false[/code], the filled image chunk shall not overwrite the original image. The filled chunk is returned as another [Image] in all cases. [enum KernelConnectivity] specifies the flood fill algorithm. [constant KERNEL_FOUR_WAY] allows the filling pixels to go through diagonally placed opaque pixels and is slightly more efficient compared to [constant KERNEL_EIGHT_WAY].

method.name: get_pixel_or_null
method.description: Returns a [Color] pixel at specified image coordinates. Returns [code]null[/code] if coordinates lie outside the image boundaries.

method.name: get_pixelv_or_null
method.description: Same as [method get_pixel_or_null] but accepts [Vector2] for specifying image coordinates.

method.name: has_pixel
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the specified coordinates lie in between image boundaries determined by its size.

method.name: has_pixelv
method.description: Same as [method has_pixel] but uses [Vector2] for specifying image coordinates.

method.name: replace_color
method.description: Replaces all occurrences of a given color with another one within the image.

method.name: resize_hqx
method.description: Expands the image using HQ2X algorithm with the [code]scale[/code] set to [code]2[/code] or the HQ3X algorithm with the [code]scale[/code] set to [code]3[/code]. See also [method Image.expand_2x_hq2x].
